name: Super Naruto: Clash of Ninja 4
overview: Super Naruto: Clash of Ninja! 4 (SCON4), is a fan-modified version of Naruto: Gekitou Ninja Taisen! 4 (GNT4) for the Nintendo GameCube. SCON4 features numerous balance changes, added mechanics, custom animations for new moves, English text translations, new stages, and quality of life improvements as compared to the original game. SCON4 began life as GNT4 Remix and Remastered before being renamed to SCON4 in December, 2020 at the time of its version 1.0 release.
